news.title: D4vd identified as suspect in death of teenage girl found in his car
news.summary: Burke cancelled all of his planned international tour dates, including a show in Dublin, when the investigation was launched.

news.title: Line of Duty to return for seventh season
news.summary: The Belfast-filmed show will begin shooting early next year.

news.title: London's O2 issues apology for confiscating Palestine shirts from fans at Lorde show
news.summary: Lorde is set to play her first-ever headline Irish show at Dublin's RDS Simmonscourt this Saturday, November 22.

news.title: Róisín O announces Whelan's show
news.summary: Tickets will go on sale Friday, November 21.

news.title: Kneecap release new single 'No Comment' feat. Sub Focus
news.summary: The group are currently on their sold-out UK tour.

news.title: Danny Brown announces Dublin show
news.summary: Tickets will go on sale Friday, November 21 at 10am.

news.title: THUMPER announce new album and Dublin show
news.summary: Tickets are on sale now and can be found at the link below.

news.title: Kiera Dignam, Ailsha, Bridín and more to play at 12th Annual Ciarán Carr Christmas Busk
news.summary: The event is held annually in honour of Ciarán Carr, who passed away from Sudden Adult Death Syndrome in 2012. All proceeds go directly to The Ciarán Carr Foundation.
